776a8b61-efab-4a1c-a985-9d94374adee9.description: Earners of this recognition have met all program graduation requirements and have learned the fundamentals of Microsoft Power Platform enabling them to successfully prepare to take Power Platform Certifications and begin a new career path in low-code. These learners demonstrate knowledge and familiarity in solution building, process automation, and data analysis. Course work included guided e-learning, app development and dashboard creation labs, and a final app development challenge.
776a8b61-efab-4a1c-a985-9d94374adee9.name: Microsoft Power Up Program – Power Platform Course Completion

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Power Up Program

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 75% of all self-paced, beginner level, video modules and Microsoft Learn activity modules for Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages, Power Virtual Agents and Dataverse over a 12-week period.

Complete the App in a Day and Dashboard in a Day self-paced modules—beginner level, hands-on lab experiences with Microsoft Power Platform technologies (App in a Day – Power Apps, Power Automate, and Microsoft Dataverse. Dashboard in a Day – Power BI).
Submit an application developed using Power Platform technology and meet the requirements as stated in the challenge, as assessed by Power Platform subject matter experts.
